page.title: 05Childrens Games
page.content:
***************
Play times are welcomed by every child. Children invent many games. Here, some are explained: Football: You have to win the ball and pass it among your team and score in the opponents goal. The winner is the team that have scored the most goals after a fixed period of time. Tiggy: is a game where one chosen person has to chase the rest of the children. If they catch up to someone and touches them with his or her hand then the person they touched chases the others. Racing: is a game where all the children (except one) face in the same direction but still stand in a straight line (not facing each other). When the one not participating says "Go" they run to a fixed point. First there wins!
